ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] I can't log into my sony station account. Help.
ygData.msgSnippet: Try this site. http://www.station.sony.com/support/ Good luck, I hopr you get it sorted. Rick Edward Fox  wrote: I have a problem. I m
ygData.messageBody:
Try this site.
 
http://www.station.sony.com/support/
 
Good luck, I hopr you get it sorted.
 
Rick

Edward Fox <spambucket0@...> wrote:
I have a problem. I'm paid up on both my Everquest and my Everquest II
accounts. But I can't log on. Unfortunately I have to log on to tell
customer support that I can't log on so that we can get the problem fixed.

Is there a way that I can reach sony customer support without logging on?

They have my login name. I checked that out by telling the sony
station web page that I forgot my login name. I entered my email
address and they sent me the name I always use.

But it doesn't work with the password. I tried telling the page that I
forgot my password. I got email with a link for a page that was
supposed to send me a temporary password. The link doesn't work.

Somebody help me please. I'm on my off day. I have nothing to do and
I'm getting bored. G.

Edward
